text:
@SpeakerPelosi America is in big trouble. It is likely to get worse before it gets better. :( We need to expand covid19 emergency unemployment insurance at least through Dec. 31st. Pls sign the petition and retweet. It only takes 20 seconds to sign. 1.3 million so far.

https://t.co/RmdW19BzfU
